content: the èveryday bow èveryday knits pattern the original design for this bow came to me after i spun my very first yarn i didn t end up with very much and i was searching for the perfect small project i could work up quickly something that would use this gorgeous yarn without wasting a single bit ever since i was little i ve always loved bows so i thought why not knit one a simple cute bow with a subtly slanted garter stitch and added crochet edge for a lovely polished look perfect for tying onto a hair elastic or clipping onto a purse and that s how the èveryday bow was born everyday blossom scarf / cowl @èveryday knit 1 yarn requirement worsted weight mc 40g 75-85m 82 -93yd optional worsted weight cc 5g 10m 11 yd materials 6mm us 10 knitting needles crochet hook no 3 weaving needle 1 stitch marker finished measurements the bow untied measures approximately 28 71 cm gauge all gauges should work you may need to adjust the needle size to suit your specific yarn brown/ pink worsted weight -
